meta.title: Embedded Collaboration | Aviso Swarm
meta.description: Why switch tools endlessly when you can use one workspace across your entire customer lifecycle? Setup meetings. Create and share call transcripts. Review deals. Get documents signed. And celebrate wins- all within Aviso

content.subtitle: Aviso Swarm
content.title: The Revenue Command Center
content.description: One workspace across your entire customer lifecycle. Setup meetings. Create and share call transcripts. Review deals. Get documents signed. And celebrate wins - all within Aviso.

content.title: Replace upto 6 point solutions in your sales stack. With one end-to-end Revenue Collaboration Platform

items.title: The Sales Silo problem
items.description:
• Scattered conversations across Zoom, Google Meet, Slack and email result in siloed data
  • Difficult to quickly share transcripts, notes, slides or next steps to customers or colleagues
  • Knowing context with a prospect is time-consuming.
  • Difficult to keep track of document signatures and confirmations across multiple stakeholders
  • Tasks and next steps assigned tend to get stuck in one platform and never get acted upon.
  • Total Cost of Ownership increases with several point solutions.
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-6 w-6" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M19 20H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h10a2 2 0 012 2v1m2 13a2 2 0 01-2-2V7m2 13a2 2 0 002-2V9a2 2 0 00-2-2h-2m-4-3H9M7 16h6M7 8h6v4H7V8z" /></svg>

items.title: The Aviso Swarm Advantage
items.description:
• Dedicated Rooms for focused actions. Yet glued together into one cohesive workspace
  • Easily share documents, notes and NLP-driven insights to buyers and teammates in 1 click.
  • Context at your fingertips. Pull up past calls, summaries or snippets all in one place.
  • Easily invite the right participants to every call. Assign and track documents for signatures
  • Tasks assigned in one space magically appear and get done across any corner of Aviso
  • Less tech stack spend. Fewer integrations to build. More accurate data.
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-6 w-6" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 21a4 4 0 01-4-4V5a2 2 0 012-2h4a2 2 0 012 2v12a4 4 0 01-4 4zm0 0h12a2 2 0 002-2v-4a2 2 0 00-2-2h-2.343M11 7.343l1.657-1.657a2 2 0 012.828 0l2.829 2.829a2 2 0 010 2.828l-8.486 8.485M7 17h.01" /></svg>

content.subtitle: NETAPP
content.title: I have always believed in Trevor's vision and the potential of the platform Aviso created. Their clients are now realizing the full potential of the ground breaking technology Aviso implemented as GTM leaders deal with the profound post pandemic transition in their organizations

logo.label: Aviso Swarm

content.subtitle: SALES SPACES
content.title: Small collaborative drops. Massive revenue ocean
content.description: Sales is a team sport, and the best teams win together. Easily communicate with teammates, share call recordings, notes, snippets and transcriptions without leaving Aviso. Empower your team to work together in a state of flow.

items.description: Unify insights and action items. Align different teams in one place.

items.description: Share messages, record meetings, and swarm to drive deals. Annotate feedback and assign to-dos.

items.description: Foster a single source of truth through integrations with Zoom, Slack, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, Moxo and Outreach

content.subtitle: CONTEXT NUDGES
content.title: Make your Eureka moments count
content.description: Seamlessly create and execute calls with buyers or your team in one-click. Find points of discussion and communicate them without missing a single key insight. Cut through the chaos with contextual, noise-free spaces.

items.description: Spotted a deal heading south? Aviso nudges you to set up a Deal Room in 1 click. Find relevant documents waiting for you.
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd" /></svg>

items.description: Quickly set Forecasting Rooms where you can align your team around predictive strategy, business pivots and reviews.

items.description: Spotted a rep performing less than their potential? Easily execute coachable moments with Coach Rooms.

content.subtitle: DEAL DOCUMENTATION
content.title: More deals on track. Less contract heart-attacks
content.description: Don’t let signature delays be the reason deals spill over into next quarter. Send critical files to every stakeholder without leaving Aviso. Monitor pending e-signatures. Close every closable deal.

items.description: Track and store deal-specific confirmations, even from email threads with text, voice, image, and video collaboration

items.description: Analyze the talk ratios, question rate, risks and intent for every call with Aviso’s NLP-based smart transcriptions.

content.subtitle: SAVE MONEY AND TIME
content.title: Higher productivity meets a smaller sales stack
content.description: No more tab-toggling. One platform to message, setup and execute meetings. Work faster, gain deeper insights and save money on your tech stack.

items.description: Replace your Messaging and Meeting Software through setting up in-app calls and chat inside Aviso.
